title: New: Ms. D – Shoot Me With The Truth
body:
Having already written for **Wiley** (Heatwave, Can You Hear Me, Reload) and **Iggy Azalea** (Bounce), London’s **Ms.**

**D** is branching out on her own, on debut single _Shoot Me With The Truth_. As blog-partner in crime [disco naïveté](disconaivete.com) pointed out to me, it almost feels like it’s swaggered straight from the set of a 60’s Western. This is a fully-loaded hit.

As blog-partner in crime disco naïveté pointed out to me, it almost feels like it’s swaggered straight from the set of a 60’s \[…\]
